com.googlecode.mrsqg.mrs
Class Var

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.mrsqg.mrs.Var

public class Var
extends java.lang.Object

A class for values as in feature-value pairs in MRS. Data structure used to hold <var> element in an MRS xml file. <var> is used by both <fvpair> and <mrs> thus it can't be declared private in ElementaryPredication

Author:
Xuchen Yao

setExtrapairValue

public void setExtrapairValue(java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String value)
Set the value of extrapair. E.g. path="SF", value="QUES" set the value of the "SF" extrapair to "QUES".

Parameters:
path - path of this extrapair
value - value of this extrapair
